name: Vegan Mushroom Ceviche
author: Antonia Orozco
summary: This vegan mushroom ceviche is made with white mushrooms, carrots, tomatoes, and onion. It gets its spice from pickled jalapeno peppers. Serve as a dip with crackers or with tostadas. [Recipe originally submitted to Allrecipes.com.mx]
ingredients: 3 (8 ounce) packages fresh white mushrooms, chopped
1  fresh serrano pepper, seeded and chopped
1  pickled jalapeno pepper, seeded and chopped
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Add garlic and cook for 10 seconds
Stir in mushrooms and season with salt; cook until soft, about 8 minutes
Place mushrooms in a large bowl and add tomatoes, carrots, onion, cilantro, serrano pepper, and jalapeno pepper
Combine lime juice, tomato juice, ketchup, and pickle juice in a second bowl
Pour over mushroom mixture and let stand for 20 minutes
